Subject: So You Want to Get a Degree in Comics?
Description: Have you ever wanted to write an essay on the Marvel universe? How about an honors thesis or a dissertation? This panel discusses the ins and outs of studying comics at the university level and introduces the fundamentals of comics studies.  Speakers include:Elizabeth 'Biz' Nidjam, Zack Kruse - Track: Comics  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
